parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The failure of the instrument cluster and display systems can cause confusion and distraction while driving, potentially leading to accidents.
symptoms: Illumination of the instrument cluster
information center screen
and climate controls dim partially or completely during daytime driving
randomly and frequently.

parsedComplaintsResult.issueCategory: Key Fob and Remote Control Issues
parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The malfunction of the key fob and remote control can cause unintended activation of features, potentially leading to accidents or injuries.
symptoms: Tailgate opens while the vehicle is in traffic
and the transmission is in 'D' drive; buttons on the remote key fob
including lock
unlock
tailgate
and panic
work even if the vehicle is turned on and driving.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The failure of the engine and cooling systems can cause the vehicle to break down, potentially leading to accidents or strandings.
symptoms: No sensors indicate an issue with the coolant or oil
but the vehicle breaks down on the side of the road; URO Parts Engine Oil Filter Housing failure.

parsedComplaintsResult.issueCategory: Lane Departure Warning and Blind Spot Detection Issues
parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The malfunction of the lane departure warning and blind spot detection systems can cause accidents or injuries due to unintended lane changes or collisions.
symptoms: Lane departure warning system does not vibrate the steering wheel as advertised; blind spot warning system does not vibrate the steering wheel; lane departure warning system does not work at all.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The failure of the sunroof and windshield can cause injuries or distractions while driving.
symptoms: Sunroof shatters randomly; windshield damages due to chips hitting the glass.

parsedComplaintsResult.issueCategory: Emergency Call and SOS System Malfunctions
parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The malfunction of the emergency call and SOS systems can cause delays or failures in emergency responses.
symptoms: Car SOS system makes a false call to the police department; emergency call malfunction message appears on the dashboard.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The failure of the child safety restraints can cause injuries or fatalities in the event of an accident.
symptoms: Plastic covers over the lower child safety restraint buckles rip out during driving
causing the child seat to become loose and unsafe.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The malfunction of the trailer stabilization control system can cause accidents or injuries due to trailer sway or loss of control.
symptoms: Trailer stabilization control system does not activate to reduce sway/oscillation
leading to accidents.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: Sudden loss of control, inability to shift gears, and potential accidents.
symptoms: Clutch pedal feels soft or spongy
clutch pedal sticks to the floor
vehicle shifts to Neutral unexpectedly
error messages related to transmission and clutch.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: Loss of critical safety features, unexpected behavior, and potential accidents.
symptoms: Unknown warning lights
instrument panel glitches
loss of backup camera display
inaccurate speedometer
digital speedometer stuck in kilometers per hour
sudden shutdown of engine
and malfunctioning of safety features like airbag and 4-wheel drive systems.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: Increased risk of accidents and injuries due to malfunctioning safety features.
symptoms: Automatic braking system malfunction
failure of airbag system
malfunctioning of 4-wheel drive system
and failure of backup camera system.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: Damage to property and potential injuries due to unexpected opening of tailgate.
symptoms: Tailgate opens randomly while parked or driving
damage to garage door and property.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: Failure of critical safety features and potential accidents due to unreliable communication systems.
symptoms: Failure of BMW Telematics Control Unit (TCB)
water damage to electronic communication device
and malfunctioning of emergency response systems.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The unintended opening of the tailgate or trunk can cause accidents, injuries, or damage to property, especially when the vehicle is in motion or parked in a confined space.
symptoms: The tailgate or trunk opens on its own without any input from the driver
even when the vehicle is locked and the key is not nearby
while driving
parked
or stopped.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The sudden shattering of the panoramic sunroof can cause injuries, damage to the vehicle, and distraction to the driver, potentially leading to accidents.
symptoms: The panoramic sunroof explodes or shatters without warning
causing a loud noise and glass debris
even when the vehicle is stationary or in motion.
